text: Jordi Alba Ramos (born 21 March 1989) is a Spanish football player. He plays as a left back for Barcelona and the Spain national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Cornellà 2006–07 Primera Catalana 15 3 — — — 15 3 Gimnàstic (loan) 2008–09 Segunda División 35 4 1 0 — — 36 4 Valencia 2009–10 La Liga 15 1 2 0 9 0 — 26 1 2010–11 La Liga 27 2 4 0 3 0 — 34 2 2011–12 La Liga 32 2 8 0 10 1 — 50 3 Total 74 5 14 0 22 1 — 110 6 Barcelona 2012–13 La Liga 29 2 4 1 9 2 2 0 44 5 2013–14 La Liga 15 0 5 0 4 0 2 0 26 0 2014–15 La Liga 27 1 6 1 11 0 — 44 2 2015–16 La Liga 31 0 3 1 9 0 2 0 45 1 2016–17 La Liga 26 1 6 0 6 0 1 0 39 1 2017–18 La Liga 33 2 5 1 8 0 2 0 48 3 2018–19 La Liga 36 2 6 0 11 1 1 0 54 3 2019–20 La Liga 27 2 3 0 5 0 1 0 36 2 2020–21 La Liga 35 3 5 2 7 0 2 0 49 5 2021–22 La Liga 30 2 2 0 11 1 1 0 44 3 2022–23 La Liga 24 2 2 0 3 0 1 0 30 2 Total 313 17 47 6 84 4 15 0 459 27 Inter Miami 2023 Major League Soccer 7 1 1 0 — 5 1 13 2 Career total 444 30 63 6 106 5 20 1 633 42 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Spain 2011 2 0 2012 13 2 2013 9 3 2014 9 0 2015 6 1 2016 11 0 2017 8 2 2018 9 0 2019 3 0 2020 0 0 2021 10 0 2022 11 1 2023 2 0 Total 93 9 :Spain score listed first, score column indicates score after each Alba goal.
